Ranomafana National Park, parcelle 3, S of National Road 25 at 7 km W of Ranomafana; Talatakely trail system; moist montane forest characterized by trees of Weinmannia spp., MONIMIACEAE (Tambourissa, Decarydendron, Ephippiandra), LAURACEAE (primarily Ocotea and Cryptocarya); understory with abundant Psychotria spp., Oncostemum spp., and Cyathea spp.
